# dokku_app (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "dokku_app" "demo" {
  app_name = "demo"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `app_name` (String)

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
# dokku_app can be imported by specifying the app name
terraform import dokku_app.demo demo
```
